DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number obtained from Clinical Trials.gov for each applicable clinical trial included, relied upon, or otherwise referred to, in the application/submission which the certification accompanies.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A numeral or string of numerals used for identification relating to a research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Relating to, concerned with, limited to, owned by, or in the interests of a particular nation.:A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care.

Concepts.definition: Relating to, concerned with, limited to, owned by, or in the interests of a particular nation.
A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.

Property.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.
